tool.name: Extract barcodes
tool.command: extract_bcs.py '$reads' #if $barcode_pattern and $barcode_pattern is not None: '$barcode_pattern' #end if --bcs '$extracted_barcodes' > '$reads_cleaned'

param.label: Pattern for extracting barcode nucleotides
param.help: Starting at 5'-end. X positions will be moved to a separate file, N positions will be kept.
param.name: barcode_pattern

tool.help:
bctools - Extract barcodes according to pattern ===============================================
Exract barcodes from a FASTQ file according to a user-specified pattern and write them to a separate FASTQ file.
